Address.Address1: Abidei Hurriyet Cd No:179 Sisli , Istanbul Turkey

Description.Text: Bade Hotel Sisli is a delightful contemporarily designed luxury Hotel with modern, spacious and elegantly decorated rooms offers traditional Turkish hospitality with sophisticated style and provide unique location for leisure and business travellers. The hotel is ideally placed in the heart of Maslak Business District and Taksim / Beyoglu District where the heart of Istanbul night life beats.

the hotel is conveniently located in Sisli district within steps away to the Sisli metro station. The hotel is surrounded with lots of shopping malls including Cevahir Shopping Mall which is the largest one in all europe.
All the rooms feature a small seating area and has city view.
This is a modern apartment building.
Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served at this property.
This hotel has a medium lobby.
